description: Job Title: Venture Associate Company: Entr3pnr.com Location: Remote Employment Type: Full-Time About Us: Entr3pnr.com is a private equity firm and CRM/cap table management software platform dedicated to empowering entrepreneurs and businesses. We help startups and companies manage their equity while connecting them to investment opportunities. Job Summary: We are looking for a results-driven Venture Associate to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for sourcing, negotiating, and closing clients to join our platform. Your primary focus will be to onboard companies that issue free equity through our platform while driving targets for paying customers. Key Responsibilities:     •    Identify and approach prospective businesses and entrepreneurs to onboard them onto our platform.     •    Persuade clients to issue free equity through our CRM and cap table management platform.     •    Meet and exceed targets for onboarding paying customers to the platform.     •    Build and maintain a pipeline of prospective clients and investors using outreach strategies and networking.     •    Conduct market research to identify promising startups and potential partners.     •    Develop proposals, pitch decks, and customized strategies to close deals effectively.     •    Maintain detailed records of interactions, client agreements, and progress in the CRM system.     •    Work closely with internal teams to ensure smooth onboarding and customer satisfaction. Qualifications:     •    Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, or a related field.     •    Proven track record in sales, client acquisition, or business development.     •    Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.     •    Goal-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding targets.     •    Ability to analyze market trends and tailor approaches to client needs.     •    Familiarity with CRM systems and cap table management software is an advantage.     •    Entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for startups and private equity. What We Offer:     •    Performance-based incentives and rewards for achieving client acquisition and revenue targets.     •    A dynamic, fast-paced environment with opportunities for professional growth.     •    Collaborative culture with access to cutting-edge tools and resources.     •    Competitive base salary and benefits package. How to Apply: Send your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and how you would contribute to our mission. Join Entr3pnr.com and take an active role in shaping the future of entrepreneurship and equity management!
title: Entr3pnr.com venture associate

description: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled and engaging coding instructor to teach Python and potentially other programming languages to students aged 7-18. The instructor will create a positive and interactive learning experience tailored to the needs of students with varying levels of proficiency, from beginners to advanced learners. Responsibilities: Teach coding concepts, primarily in Python, to students ranging from primary to high school. Develop customized lesson plans and activities for different skill levels. Use creative and age-appropriate teaching methods to make coding fun and understandable. Provide regular progress updates and constructive feedback to students and parents. Create and assign coding projects that challenge and develop students’ problem-solving skills. Prepare students for coding competitions, school projects, or certifications, if applicable. Address questions and provide one-on-one support when needed. Requirements: Educational Background: A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (preferred). Certifications or relevant training in coding and programming (optional but beneficial). Technical Skills: Proficiency in Python is mandatory. Familiarity with other languages such as JavaScript, Scratch, HTML/CSS, or Java is a plus. Experience with coding tools, IDEs, and educational platforms for kids. Teaching Experience: Proven experience teaching coding to kids or teens, preferably online. Ability to simplify complex coding concepts for young learners. Experience working with diverse age groups (7-18 years). Soft Skills: Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Patience and enthusiasm for teaching young students. Creative and engaging teaching style to keep students motivated. Availability: Flexible schedule to accommodate students in different time zones. Commitment to conducting regular classes (mention frequency or schedule details if applicable). Equipment and Technology: Reliable high-speed internet connection. Familiarity with online teaching platforms (Zoom, Google Meet, etc.). Ability to create digital teaching materials (e.g., slides, videos). Preferred Qualities: Passionate about teaching and inspiring young minds. Familiarity with primary to high school coding curricula. Experience in preparing students for coding competitions or advanced courses. Additional Details: Specify your preferred teaching hours or time zones. Indicate whether the role is for group classes, one-on-one sessions, or both. Mention the duration of each class and the expected frequency (e.g., 2 hours per week). How to Apply: Please include the following in your application: Resume highlighting relevant teaching and coding experience. A short introduction or cover letter explaining your teaching approach and why you are a great fit. Samples of your teaching materials (if available). References or reviews from previous students/parents (if applicable).
title: Need a coding teaching for basic to advance level teaching of Python, Javascript, and others

description: • Drafting and reviewing a variety of commercial agreements including software licensing agreements, SaaS subscription agreements, distribution center equipment purchases/leases, and other high-dollar value contracts • Researching and evaluating different risk factors regarding business decisions and operations
title: Paralegal Requested with Contract Review Experience

description: Description: We are seeking an experienced Bubble.io developer with a strong background in software engineering (not just Bubble experience) to join our team and help enhance and maintain our live dating app. This app is already available on the App Store and has paying customers. We’re looking for an independent freelancer (no agencies, please) who is highly skilled, responsive, and thrives in a fast-paced, startup environment. If you love solving problems, squashing bugs, and improving functionality for real users, we’d love to hear from you! What We Need from You: Bubble.io expertise: Advanced proficiency in Bubble with hands-on experience developing and debugging complex apps. Software engineering skills: Strong coding and problem-solving abilities, ensuring scalable and maintainable solutions. Startup mindset: Ability to adapt quickly, think critically, and contribute innovative ideas. Commitment: 20 hours per week of dedicated, responsive support to handle bug fixes and feature updates. Strong communication skills: Ability to provide regular updates and collaborate with the team effectively. What You'll Be Working On: Debugging and fixing bugs in the existing app to enhance the user experience. Collaborating on feature updates to keep the app competitive and user-friendly. Ensuring the app remains responsive and performs optimally across devices. Addressing real-time issues reported by our users and team. What We Offer: A chance to work on a live product with real paying customers. A collaborative, startup-oriented environment. Competitive pay for a part-time, ongoing role (20 hours per week). If you're a Bubble.io expert with software engineering experience and are excited to work on a growing product in the dating app space, we’d love to hear from you! Please include your experience with Bubble.io and any relevant coding/software engineering projects in your application. If you're an agency - do not apply.
title: Bubble.io developer with actual coding experience too

description: We have an old computer running widows CE with a a software that is 14 years old, we were able to get a newer version of the software which is 6 years old but we are having issues trying to copy the software over to the old computer as we cannot get into a safe mode to turn the software off from booting automatically, when do exit the software once booted it disables the keynote and mouse function in windows CE which makes us unable to do anything. Need to see if there is a way to modify the NK.bin so it stops automatically loading the software when windows CE loads up and a way to enable keyboard + mouse functions to allow to open file explorer etc to try to overwrite the old software
title: Edit a Windows CE bootloader NK.bin file to modify booting process and enable features that are off

description: The project involves: Hardware Design & Prototyping: Creating custom IoT units capable of operating in harsh marine environments with sensors for high temperature, water level, DC voltage, open fire, and shock detection technology integrated into robust IP67 enclosure. Network Design: The communication will utilize LoRaWAN for long-range, energy-efficient data transfer. Developing a reliable LoRaWAN "private" network to ensure consistent communication in marinas with thousands of boats in close proximity, built from varying materials such as fiberglass, aluminum, carbon, and wood. System Integration: Ensuring seamless operation between hardware, software, and networking components, including data transfer to cloud platforms. Web User Interface Development: Building a responsive platform for desktop and mobile, allowing users to access real-time data and actionable insights through an intuitive interface. The system must also be scalable, growing from hundreds to thousands of units based on customer needs. If this aligns with your expertise, we’d love to discuss how you can help bring this vision to life.
title: IoT development for harsh marine environments sensors.

description: I am seeking an experienced professional to assist in recovering a partially filled PDF form from my PC. Unfortunately, the form was not saved before the system shutdown, and I need help retrieving any available data. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of file recovery methods and tools. Please provide a brief overview of your experience with PDF recovery and any relevant software you are familiar with.
title: PDF Form Recovery Specialist Needed

description: We are looking for an innovative game designer to help create engaging, educational, and fun card and board games (physically printed) for our professional training workshops. These games will be used to teach leadership, hospitality skills, and employee engagement in an interactive and memorable way. If you have a passion for designing games that inspire learning while keeping players entertained, we’d love to hear from you! Scope of Work: You will design physical 2 card games and 1 board game for production tailored to specific training focuses: Card Games: 1. Leadership Development (targeted at leaders and managers). 2. Hospitality Skills (focused on frontline employees). Board Game Leadership game focusing on Employee Engagement & Culture Improvement to drive customer experience and business results. Deliverables: - Game Concepts: Creative and detailed concepts for each game (2 card games, 1 board game). - Game Mechanics: Clear rules, gameplay instructions, and any necessary components (e.g., cards, boards, tokens). - Prototypes: Printable prototypes or digital mockups of the games for testing purposes. - Revisions: Incorporation of feedback from initial playtests to refine the games. -Final Design Files: Ready-to-use designs for cards, boards, and other game components. Game Requirements: - Engaging & Educational: Games should be fun and interactive while teaching key skills. - Time Limits: Card games (10–30 minutes), board games (30–60 minutes). - User Focus: Hospitality skills games for frontline employees, leadership and engagement games for managers. - Easy Setup: Simple to learn and set up in a workshop setting. - Professional Look: Designs should align with our brand's professional and inspiring tone. Ideal Candidate: - Experience designing card and/or board games (portfolio required). - Familiarity with corporate training or educational content is a plus. - Strong creative and conceptual skills. - Ability to collaborate and iterate based on feedback. - Knowledge of game design tools and software. - Knowledge of companies to use to produce actual product (very important). Budget: Open to proposals. Please include an estimated cost for the project and your hourly or fixed rates. Application Requirements: - A brief introduction to your game design experience. - Portfolio or examples of previous game design work (especially educational or professional games). -Your estimated timeline for completion. About Us: Ignite Your Service Training and Consulting is a bespoke firm based in Central Florida. We specialize in leadership, customer experience, and employee engagement training. Our mission is to create lasting positive change in workplaces through impactful and memorable experiences. Learn more about us at https://www.igniteyourservice.com. Thank you for your time.
title: Design Physical Board Game and Card Game

description: Please read this whole description before you reply to this job post. This is the website of my current CPA and bookkeeper and she does none of what she states she can assist with. I need someone who is reachable and can be a asset to me. My company is only 3 years old and only does 300K in sales... But we are growing. Are you familiar with Bench.co as they are part of our bookkeepers program. My problem with Susan my current CPA is she is too busy for me and I can never reach her. Her website says the following and I need all of these services When You Leave the Bookkeeping to Me, You Can Focus on Growing Your Business Accurate bookkeeping is essential to your company’s long-term viability. Experienced, affordable, and reliable, I serve a variety of industries and clients from self-employed home-based business owners to small and medium-sized businesses with employees. When you outsource your bookkeeping services to me you get one on one personalized service and state of the art technology and payroll software. If you’re just starting a business, I’ll set up reporting and recordkeeping systems that make it easy for you to keep track of where your money is going. If you’ve been in business for a while, but need help cleaning up your books, I’ll work with you to streamline your bookkeeping systems and set up a system of checks and balances. But the best reason to use my bookkeeping services? You’ll have more time to focus on running your business and generating more profits. Bookkeeping Services for Small Businesses Accounts payable (entry, bill paying) Accounts receivable (entry, invoicing, deposits, collection) Bank Reconciliations Inventory management Bookkeeping clean up General ledger Tax forms (1099s, 1096) Payroll processing Outsourced bookkeeping There's No Better Time Than Now to Take Advantage of My Bookkeeping Expertise. Call today and let me put my bookkeeping services to work for you!
title: Certified Public Accountant

description: I'm looking for a Data Table expert to build out a Salary Data table for Nursing Salaries. Features we will implement: -Collapsible Row (see here for example https://www.levels.fyi/t/software-engineer?countryId=254&country=254 and see mockup table below) -Custom CSS to match styling above below examples -Multiple Filters (filter by city, specialty, Years Experience, company, hospital type) -Search bar above table where user can type a company/city/specialty and the appropriate facilities appear -Pagination -Sort row from Highest Number to Lowest -Mobile Responsive -There are empty fields in my CSV. Ideally empty rows are hidden. -No page refresh with filter selection -Hide cells that are empty from displaying on frontend (in collapsible row) Styling and functionality I am shooting for: https://www.levels.fyi/t/software-engineer?countryId=254&country=254 and see mockup table below Mockup table: We will need to display the fields listed in my mockup. This mockup is also a table design we should shoot for. These fields in this table match the column in my sample data. https://figma.com/design/xezq8KptGoXAg5chYfQsiP/RN-Data-Table?node-id=0-1&p=f&t=pMc56ehYGzMccXTg-0 All data from this table comes from a CSV file I export from this form: https://form.fillout.com/t/fpXbEuU9Wmus. We don't need automatic syncing between CSV and the DB. I can upload it manually. Please respond with 1) any questions 2) estimated cost 3) estimated time to complete 4) when you can start Looking to move forward ASAP
title: Custom Data Table to Embed on WP page

description: We are looking for a skilled project management professional who can provide a 30min-1hour consultation to review our current document (very basic), then share their expertise on what we should be capturing in the document and the type of tool we should be utilizing to help track all our projects so management can have a easy to read dashboard to view key info. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of project management principles and be proficient in using Microsoft Excel or project management software. The main tasks include explaining the key components of a project management document, demonstrating how to create a project timeline, and providing tips on effective data visualization. Attention to detail and excellent communication skills are essential. Relevant skills: - Project management - Microsoft Excel - Data visualization Size: Small Duration: 1-2 weeks Expertise: Intermediate
title: Project Management Excel/Document Consultation

description: We are a digital marketing group that specializes in SEO. We acquire warm leads who have shown interest in monthly SEO plans, typically starting at $500. Many of these leads are ready for a conversation, but they often receive calls from other providers as well. We want a Sales Representative who is comfortable calling leads several times a day. You will also send texts and emails. Timing is crucial, so you should be online and ready to engage when a fresh lead appears. Early on, you can expect to work around three hours per day, with growth potential up to six hours if the volume of leads increases. Your main aim is to persuade small companies to commit to a recurring plan for six months. We know that some businesses may be cautious about long-term plans. This is why we offer an accessible monthly rate and highlight the value of consistent SEO work. You will have scripts and initial training to help you. Our team can also join calls with larger prospects until you feel comfortable working solo. Compensation includes a $200 weekly base. Deals at $500 per month earn a 15% commission, paid every two weeks. Larger contracts yield 10% commission. The leads are not cheap, so we are selective. We want someone who can capitalize on every connection and drive revenue. We prefer candidates with proven sales experience. Previous involvement in digital marketing or SEO sales is ideal. You must be persuasive, self-driven, and reliable under pressure. Objection handling should come naturally to you. If that sounds like your style, we would like to speak with you. To apply, please share details on your past sales performance and your availability for daily contact with multiple leads. We are open to candidates who know how to close monthly subscriptions and keep clients satisfied long-term. * Must have a reliable internet connection and computer * Good pair of headsets since you will be calling using our software.
title: Commission Driven SEO Sales Closer Needed (Base+Commission)

Please attach you portfolio to review - If we like your work, we will likely reach out to discuss. Looking forward to connecting with everyone. Thank you, C
title: Videographer / Content Creator in Southern California (LA, OC. SD preferred)

title: Senior Integration Engineer - Senior Application Developer

title: React Dev and ongoing website maintenance

description: Description: I am seeking a skilled developer to assist with completing and optimizing the sidebar navigation for a desktop application currently in production. The application uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, and the foundational codebase for the sidebar has already been built. Your role will be to finalize the sidebar, improve its visual design based on a photo I will provide, and ensure it is fully functional and optimized. Additionally, you will create placeholder pages for each button in the sidebar to maintain a consistent GUI throughout the application. If the initial work meets the project standards and expectations, there is potential for ongoing work to further enhance and develop additional features within the desktop application. Responsibilities 1. Finalize Sidebar Navigation: -Use the provided codebase, files, and folder structure to complete the existing sidebar navigation. - Refine and optimize the code for better performance and readability. - Enhance the visual design to align with the provided mockup or photo. 2. Placeholder Page Creation: - Create functional placeholder pages linked to each sidebar button. - Ensure the placeholder pages follow the design and layout style of the application. - Add appropriate styling and structure for a consistent user experience. 3. Code Quality: - Maintain clean, well-documented, and reusable code. - Test and debug the sidebar and placeholder pages to ensure error-free functionality. Requirements 1. Technical Skills: - Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for front-end development. - Strong knowledge of Python for backend integration. - Familiarity with frameworks like PyQt, Electron, or similar for desktop applications. - Experience with responsive and interactive UI design principles. 2. Experience: - Proven track record of developing or enhancing desktop applications. - Prior experience with building and styling navigation menus or sidebars. - Ability to work with existing codebases and improve them. Deliverables 1. Finalized Sidebar Navigation: - Fully functional and visually appealing sidebar. - Optimized code that integrates seamlessly with the existing application. 2. Placeholder Pages: - Individual placeholder pages for each button in the sidebar. - Consistent design and layout style across the application. 3. Documentation: - Clear and detailed comments in the code. - Instructions for maintaining or modifying the sidebar and pages in the future. If this project aligns with your skills and experience, I’d love to hear from you. Please include examples of relevant work or projects in your proposal.
title: Developer Needed for Sidebar Navigation and Placeholder Page Setup in Python Desktop Application

description: Need an experienced IT Mainframe Application Assistance expert. The selected consultant will help train personnel to meet the demands of supporting the critical infrastructure systems. Responsibilities Support ongoing critical infrastructure systems in these IBM disciplines: IBM Mainframe (MF) Z Operating Systems (z/OS) IBM Database 2 (DB2)/IBM Information Management Systems (IMS) database subsystem IBM Content Manager On Demand (CMOD) Cloudpak Business Optimization *Provide knowledge transfer to staff through training and job shadowing. * Conduct online training sessions. These sessions will be recorded for future reference. * Provide a detailed task outline and working procedure upon completion of each requirement. Requirements: Must Hold an IBM Mainframe Systems Programmer Level III Certificate 2.5 * Minimum of 3 years of experience utilizing IBM System Z Operating systems. * Experience in performing upgrades, mainframe monitoring, and installation and customization of hardware and software. * Excellent communication and training skills. This is a great opportunity to share your expertise and make a real impact on a critical infrastructure system. If you are a highly motivated and experienced IT professional, we encourage you to apply.
title: Onsite IT Mainframe Application Assistance Expert Long Beach CA

description: We are seeking a Security Operations Center Analyst to triage security alerts generated from our SIEM (Sentinel). Triage alerts as false positives or react to true positives by resetting user passwords or isolating computer accounts in Microsoft Defender for Endpoint. Escalate incidents to customers using our Service Desk Software. The technologies that the person will be working with include Microsoft Sentinel, the entire suite of Microsoft 365 Defender products, and potentially Microsoft Defender for Cloud. Candidates for this role should be familiar with attack vectors, cyberthreats, incident management, and Kusto Query Language (KQL). Must Have: Prior experience working in a Security Operating Center Above Average English Language - Verbal and Written A laptop with a fast and stable Internet Connection Nice to Have: Security Certifications: SC-200, AZ-500 We are hiring for the following Weekend shifts: 2nd Shift (8 AM PST to 4 PM PST) Floater (Fill in for our other SOC Analysts when they are sick, on vacation, etc.)
title: Security Operations Center Analyst I

You will work closely with our development and operations teams to integrate security practices throughout the software development lifecycle. If you are passionate about IT security and compliance, and thrive in a remote work environment, we want to hear from you!
title: IT Security Architect & DevSecOps Compliance Expert (Remote)

The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of decentralized technologies and experience in building robust data solutions in the financial sector. Responsibilities include designing system architecture, ensuring data security, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. If you are passionate about innovation in blockchain and finance, we want to hear from you!
title: Expert Software Developer for Blockchain and FinTech Data Platform Architecture

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled AI/ML Engineer to design, build, and deploy cutting-edge machine learning models and AI-driven solutions that address real-world challenges. In this role, you will work with cross-functional teams to analyze data, develop scalable algorithms, and integrate intelligent systems into production environments. Your work will focus on creating innovative solutions that improve efficiency, accuracy, and decision-making across diverse applications. Responsibilities: * Develop, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to solve business challenges. * Design and implement scalable pipelines for data collection, preprocessing, and model training. * Conduct exploratory data analysis and feature engineering to improve model performance. * Optimize and tune models for efficiency, accuracy, and scalability. * Integrate machine learning models into production systems and ensure seamless deployment. * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align solutions with business objectives. * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI/ML and propose innovative approaches to leverage emerging technologies. * Document experiments, processes, and results, and communicate findings to technical and non-technical stakeholders. Requirements: * Strong programming skills in Python with experience in frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn. * Proven experience with machine learning techniques such as regression, classification, clustering, and deep learning. * Proficiency in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data visualization. * Solid understanding of algorithms, statistics, and probability. * Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and deploying ML models in production. * Knowledge of software engineering principles, version control (Git), and CI/CD practices. * Experience with LLMs, NLP, computer vision, or reinforcement learning. * Understanding of MLOps principles and tools for model monitoring and retraining. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
title: AI/ML Engineer

description: About Us: At AstralTech Labs, we specialize in delivering customized AI and software solutions that tackle real business challenges. From automating time-consuming processes to optimizing operations and enhancing decision-making, we equip businesses with the tools to boost productivity and achieve sustainable growth. Our tailored solutions turn raw data into actionable insights, cut operational costs, and proactively mitigate risks through advanced predictive analytics. Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced Software Solution Architect to join our team and lead the design of innovative software solutions that align with our clients’ business objectives. In this role, you will work closely with sales executives to analyze requirements, create architectural blueprints, and deliver scalable, integrated solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both technology and business strategy, with proven experience in designing end-to-end software solutions. Responsibilities: * Engage with account executives to understand clients’ business goals, technical needs, and project requirements. * Translate business requirements into architectural solutions, creating a strategic roadmap that ensures alignment with client objectives. * Design high-level solutions, including system architecture, integration points, data flows, and technology stacks, ensuring scalability, security, and performance. * Select and recommend appropriate technologies, frameworks, and third-party services to support the solution. * Provide technical time estimates to support project planning, ensuring accuracy and feasibility. * Produce detailed solution documentation, including system diagrams, process flows, and technical requirements for client presentations. * Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, ensuring that the proposed solution is understood and aligned with business expectations. * Provide ongoing support throughout the project lifecycle, working with development teams to address any architectural challenges. * Conduct regular reviews of implemented solutions to ensure consistency with architectural plans and client requirements. Requirements: * Proven experience in solution architecture or a related role within a software development or consulting environment. * Strong proficiency in architectural design patterns, microservices, cloud computing (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud), and enterprise integration. * Experience with modern programming languages and frameworks (e.g., JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Kotlin, Swift, Go, Rust, Dart, React, Angular, Vue.js, Django, Flask, Flutter). * Solid understanding of system integration, including APIs, middleware, data flows, and third-party services. * Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences. * Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail, with a proactive approach to identifying and mitigating potential risks. Preferred Qualifications: * Knowledge of regulatory compliance with highly regulated industries (healthcare, finance, etc.). * Experience with AI/ML model integration and data-driven solutions. * Knowledge of DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure-as-code tools. * Previous experience in a custom software development agency or consulting environment. AstralTech Labs is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
title: Software Solution Architect

description: Note: For consideration upload a resume. We are seeking a detail-oriented and dedicated Data Entry & Reporting Specialist to join our team. In this role, you will support our account management team by accurately entering and maintaining data, running reports, and ensuring high-quality data for multiple clients. This role requires strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and occasional direct communication with franchisees or corporate offices to verify and clarify information. Key Responsibilities: Perform accurate data entry for multiple clients to ensure records are maintained to the highest standard. Run and generate reports as required, ensuring data integrity and adherence to established reporting formats. Support the account management team by providing timely and accurate information for client accounts. Communicate with franchisees or corporate contacts when needed to confirm details, resolve discrepancies, and ensure consistent data quality. Conduct regular data cleanup tasks to maintain database accuracy and reliability. Identify data inconsistencies and take corrective action to improve data quality. Provide general administrative support as needed within the account management team. Qualifications: 1+ years of Proven experience in data entry or related field, preferably in a client-focused environment. Strong attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy. Proficient in Microsoft Excel and other reporting tools; experience with data management software is a plus. Strong communication skills, with the ability to professionally interact with clients and internal teams. Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team-oriented environment. Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently. Making a Difference in the company Way
title: Data Entry Reporting Specialist

description: About Valiant: ‎ ‎ Valiant is a full-service content creation and digital marketing agency for service businesses in the trading, reselling, sports betting, and e-commerce niches. Our clients include some of the largest companies in the online side-hustle niche including Whop.com, one of the largest digital marketplace in the world. Our current offerings include short-form video creation, email marketing, and paid advertising, among others. Over the next 12 months we have plans to expand and as a result are looking to hire additional marketing staff in our sales and business growth teams. Our vision is to be the go-to marketing agency for all types of services that help people make money online. We are already very well known in the sports betting and reselling niches however are looking to venture much further into niches we’re less known in and build a market-wide reputation for ruthlessly outperforming other marketers in the space. Compensation & Perks: 💸 $2,000 to $6,000 in monthly performance based pay. 📈 Up to $12k in monthly fixed salary based on initial 60-day performance. 🌎 Full-time remote-based position with flexible working hours. ✈️ Flights, US visa sponsorship, and accommodation for team meetups. Job Responsibilities: – Conducting daily outreach to a set number of leads via email, phone, and social media. – Utilizing and adding to outreach templates and scripts tailored to each industry or client segment. – Manage and update CRM with relevant lead and prospect information. – Assess the fit between potential clients and our company’s services. – Schedule and set up meetings or calls between qualified leads and the sales team. – Build rapport with potential clients and nurture relationships with qualified leads until they are ready for the sales process. – Act as the first point of contact for new prospects and establish a positive, lasting impression. – Stay updated on industry trends, market changes, and competitor activities to identify potential opportunities. – Work closely with the sales team to ensure alignment on targets, strategy, and lead qualification. Required Qualifications: – Must be fluent in English. If English is your second language, you must be willing to take an English test and pass as fluent. – Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage in meaningful conversations with businesses. – A passion for building relationships and a high degree of professionalism. – Willingness to learn and grow in the field of business development, with openness to feedback. – Prior experience in sales, customer service, or business outreach is a plus but not required. – Ability to manage time efficiently and stay organized in a fast-paced environment. – Comfortable using digital tools and platforms to track outreach and results. Preferred Qualifications: – Based in the United States, Canada, South Africa, the United Kingdom or Oceania. – Experience or understanding of different forms of marketing, brand development or advertising. – Experience as a BDR or SDR. – Experience with CRMs, or even better, Monday CRM. – Experience as an account manager or account executive. – Any other past sales or business experience. – Based in Florida, or even better, the Miami-Dade area. – Previous experience starting a business or experience working at smaller companies/startups. – Bachelors or Masters in business, sales or other relevant degrees. – Knowledge, or interest in sports betting, trading, reselling, online selling, or e-commerce. Who We Need: – You’ve got positive energy. You’re optimistic about the future and determined to get there. – You are looking for an exciting opportunity that isn’t just about the money. – You’re comfortable with agile workflow and are quick to iterate. – You work well with direct, rapid, and candid feedback. – You’re both an active communicator and an eager listener. – You’re passionate about sales and have high standards for your messages. – You are willing to take 100% responsibility for your conversations. – You’re willing to go outside of your comfort zone and you’re up for new challenges. – You are a very hard-working and driven person, and are flexible with your work days/hours. – You have a winners mindset. You want to win and you’re not satisfied with the status quo. – You are comfortable with startup culture. It’s casual, and not corporate, but is demanding.
title: Business Development Representative

description: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled freelance software developer to assist with a private workflow automation project. The goal is to streamline a multi-step process by integrating several third-party tools and automating key tasks. This project involves creating a user-friendly and efficient system that leverages platforms like Zapier, Microsoft Power Platform, and custom APIs. You will work closely with the project owner to enhance the workflow and implement advanced features while maintaining confidentiality. Key Responsibilities: Develop and optimize multi-step workflows using Zapier or Microsoft Power Automate. Integrate various third-party applications and tools via APIs or webhooks. Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to automation and integrations. Build custom scripts or solutions where native integrations are unavailable. Provide technical guidance and documentation for the finalized system. Required Skills & Qualifications: Proven expertise in Zapier and/or Microsoft Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps). Experience with APIs, webhooks, and third-party app integrations. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or JavaScript. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Ability to deliver high-quality work while maintaining strict confidentiality. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with workflow automation and optimization projects. Familiarity with scheduling, email, or messaging platforms. Background in developing scalable, user-friendly solutions. Project Scope: This is a private project with multiple phases. The initial phase involves automating key processes and integrating existing tools to improve efficiency. Additional phases may include advanced features and scalability enhancements. Timeline: Initial phase to be completed within 4–6 weeks, with potential for ongoing work. How to Apply: Please provide: A summary of your experience with workflow automation and integrations. Examples of past projects involving tools like Zapier, Power Automate, or custom APIs (general examples only, no confidential details). Your availability and hourly rate.
title: Software Developer - Workflow Integration

description: ***NO AI-GENERATED RESPONSES*** AI-generated responses will be printed out, burned, and possibly urinated on by dogs. Job Description: * Seeking a principal- or senior-level software engineer to design, develop, and implement an ultra-low-latency voice transcription application for device-level deployment. Required Experience: * Must have prior hands-on experience implementing or overseeing the development of voice translation interface(s) having low-latency as a critical requirement. * Must have a broad knowledge of the landscape of speech-to-text libraries and technologies. * Must have prior experience integrating machine learning models (speech recognition, NLP) into such an application, where necessary. Preferred Experience: *10+ years overall sw development experience with at least 5 yrs experience hands-on coding. Deliverable: * We have a working PoC that uses vosk's 40mb model for the transcription and our c# application listens to its broadcast then processes pre-defined keywords to execute core functions of our application. * We've experimented a bit with the available parameters but haven't seemed to have found the sweetspot between accuracy/dependency and performance (latency). * The ideal candidate will take a cursory look at the existing solution to determine what part of it (if any) can be used to accomplish our key objective of low latency and accuracy, in order to refine/expand upon the existing solution or replace it altogether. * We're targeting Friday, Jan 31 for delivery of the feature into production, which gives us a week or two to find the right candidate and buffer the holidays, then another two weeks or so to build and debug the solution over the course of 1-2 sprints, add some basic technical documentation to our Confluence, and specify the minimum/recommended hardware/system requirements for the user. Thanks for reading!
title: Ultra low latency voice translation interface

description: Company: Fitz's Fish Ponds, LLC Job Title: SEO Specialist Location: Remote Job Type: Contract - part time with potential for full time Department: Ecommerce Job Summary: We are seeking a results-driven SEO Specialist to optimize our website and online content for search engines and improve organic visibility. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms, and analytics tools to drive targeted traffic, improve rankings and execute strategies that align with business goals and maximize ROI. Key Responsibilities: Conduct comprehensive keyword research to guide content creation and optimization. Develop and implement effective on-page and off-page SEO strategies. Optimize website structure, meta tags, URLs, and content for search engines. SEO optimize products for ecommerce Monitor and analyze website performance using tools such as Google Analytics, Search Console, and SEO software. Build and execute link-building campaigns to improve domain authority and organic rankings. Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, algorithm updates, and best practices. Conduct competitor analysis to identify opportunities for improvement. Collaborate with content creators to ensure content is optimized for target keywords and audiences. Prepare and present SEO performance reports, providing actionable insights and recommendations. Troubleshoot and resolve technical SEO issues, including crawl errors, site speed, and mobile usability. Qualifications: Experience with local SEO and optimizing for multi-location businesses. Knowledge of PPC advertising and its relationship with SEO. Familiarity with schema markup and rich snippets. Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field (or equivalent experience). 3-5 years experience as an SEO Specialist or in a similar role. Proficiency in SEO tools such as SEMrush, Ahrefs, Moz, or similar platforms. Familiarity with BigCommerce platform. Strong knowledge of HTML and CSS. Excellent analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to drive decision-making. Familiarity with Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and other reporting tools. Solid understanding of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO principles. Strong communication and collaboration skills. What We Offer: Competitive hourly rate. Opportunities for professional growth and development. A collaborative and innovative work environment. Join our team and play a pivotal role in enhancing our online presence, driving organic traffic, and delivering measurable results. Apply today!
title: SEO Specialist

description: Job Description: I’m seeking a seasonal Data Entry Specialist to assist with tax document entry using UltraTax Software during the upcoming tax season. Familiarity with UltraTax is mandatory, as there is no time for training. The role requires working in a remote environment, with flexible hours, as long as tasks are completed within a reasonable timeframe. I currently manage a smaller client base (around 50 moderate clients) and need assistance to improve workflow efficiency and speed. Your support will allow me to streamline operations and focus on growing my capacity. Key Responsibilities: Enter tax document information into UltraTax Software with accuracy and attention to detail. Review and verify entries for completeness and compliance with tax preparation standards. Ensure confidentiality and security of all client information. Collaborate remotely to ensure tasks are completed promptly and efficiently. Requirements: Proficiency in UltraTax Software (must have prior experience). Ability to work independently in a remote environment with minimal supervision. Strong organizational and time management skills. Familiarity with tax-related documents is a plus. Reliable internet connection and secure workspace. Position Details: Duration: Seasonal, during the 2024 tax season (February–April). Work Hours: Flexible, as long as tasks are completed in a timely manner. Workload: Assisting with a client base of around 50 moderate clients. How to Apply: Please provide: A brief description of your experience with UltraTax Software. Examples of similar tax document entry projects you’ve worked on. Your availability during the tax season. Your proposed hourly rate.
title: Seasonal Data Entry Specialist with UltraTax Experience

description: Job Title: Fractional Project Manager for Creative Agency Job Description: We are looking for a skilled Fractional Project Manager to join our creative agency on a short-term basis. The ideal candidate will develop and implement project management software and workflows, and provide comprehensive training within a 30-day period. Responsibilities: Design and implement project management processes and workflows. Customize and set up project management software to suit agency needs. Train team members on new systems and processes. Requirements: Proven experience in project management. Strong organizational and process development skills. Ability to work independently and complete the project within 30 days. Duration: 30 days
title: Project Manager Needed to Build Workflow for Agency

description: Hello! My name is Frederic, and I am a PhD student at Carnegie Mellon University's Human-Computer Interaction Institute. I am currently studying novel interfaces to help designers learn to better collaborate and co-create with AI systems on complex 3D CAD design tasks. Through this work, I aim to gather insights for developing future support interfaces for generative AI design software. For a study, I am seeking a person with mechanical design experience and familiarity with Autodesk Fusion 360. During the study, you will be asked to complete a design task (e.g., designing an engine bracket) within Fusion360. The study is conducted over Zoom, and you will be video, audio, and screen recorded during the task. The study comprises two sessions (30 minutes and 100 minutes), and we can schedule these sessions to match your available time. I am especially looking for people familiar with Fusion 360 but have NOT previously worked with the Generative Design feature. Please let me know if you are interested in participating or have further questions. I look forward to hearing back from you! Best, Frederic
title: Looking for a Mechanical Designer for Research Study

description: Remote Sales Administrator The Ambitious Exec is an exclusive, technology-enabled, career development accelerator that guides VPs, Directors and Executives towards landing their next $150k - $1.5m role fast without relying on their existing network, on job boards or waiting around for recruiters. Learn more: www.theambitiousexec.com You play a critical role in driving all aspects of sales operations. You flex between sales admin, executive assistant, and CRM administrator functions to keep all aspects of sales operations running smoothly. Key attributes ● Organized: You ensure that CRM and sales processes are well documented and followed consistently by the sales team. You effectively keep track of roadblocks and drive issues to resolution. ● Responsive: You respond in real time to client and internal inquiries during working hours. ● Reliable: You complete all assigned tasks with accuracy and without errors. You’re “top of it” and your team members can be confident that you will handle all assigned tasks without follow-up or oversight. ● Proactive: You work with the sales team and company leaders to proactively improve processes. You consider the “intent” of a task or process so that you can suggest improvements and go beyond execution of tasks. You help identify opportunities to automate repetitive tasks. Responsibilities ● Oversee all CRM management processes across the sales team and coordinate with sales reps to ensure pipeline accuracy and data quality ● Coordinate between prospective customers and sales leads regarding email marketing responses and other inbox management needs ● Own all sales performance reporting across CRM system and downstream performance scorecards ● Coordinate all sales team onboarding and offboarding activities including access setup, completion of training, and other items. ● Executive admin support including scheduling meetings, aligning calendars, data analysis, report creation, and similar tasks.
title: Remote Sales Administrator

title: MS Access Programmer

description: Ancient City Capital is seeking a skilled and motivated Financial Analyst and Asset Manager to join our dynamic team. This role is integral to supporting our multifamily and retail investment portfolios, with a strong focus on financial modeling, budgeting, and performance analysis. The ideal candidate will bring over 4 years of experience in Excel-based financial modeling, a solid understanding of multifamily real estate (affordable housing preferred), strong ability to analyze current data and find opportunities for improvement, and excellent communication skills. Key Responsibilities: Develop and maintain complex Excel financial models for multifamily and retail assets, including pro forma projections, cash flow analyses, and valuation models. Assist in the preparation of annual property budgets and forecasts, ensuring alignment with business objectives and market trends. Analyze and compare asset performance against budgeted targets, identifying areas for improvement and opportunities for value creation. Support the Asset Management team in monitoring operational and financial performance across the portfolio. Conduct market research and data analysis to support investment decisions and asset repositioning strategies. Prepare detailed financial and operational reports for internal and external stakeholders. Collaborate with property managers and other team members to ensure accurate and timely reporting of financial and operational metrics. Participate in site visits to gain insights into asset conditions and operational challenges. Qualifications: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Real Estate, Economics, Business Administration, or a related field. Experience: Minimum of 4 years of experience in financial modeling, preferably in multifamily real estate and retail asset classes. Experience with affordable housing is a strong plus. Technical Skills: Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including data analysis, macros, and financial modeling. Familiarity with real estate management software (e.g., ResMan) is a plus. Analytical Skills: Exceptional attention to detail with the ability to synthesize complex data into actionable insights. Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills to effectively present findings and collaborate with diverse stakeholders. Location Flexibility: Willingness to work in person in Saint Augustine, FL. Relocation assistance is available for the right candidate. Benefits: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses. Relocation assistance for qualified candidates. Professional development opportunities. Collaborative and inclusive work environment. Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, 401(k), and PTO. If you are a detail-oriented financial professional with a passion for real estate and the skills to drive asset performance, we invite you to apply and become a valued member of the Ancient City Capital team. Job Type: Full-time Pay: $53,980.00 - $99,850.00 per year Benefits: 401(k) 401(k) matching Dental insurance Health insurance Paid time off Retirement plan Vision insurance Education: Bachelor's (Required) Experience: Financial modeling: 4 years (Required) asset management: 4 years (Preferred) affordable housing management: 4 years (Preferred) Location: Saint Augustine, FL 32080 (Preferred) Willingness to travel: 25% (Preferred) Work Location: Hybrid remote in Saint Augustine, FL 32080
title: Commerical Real Estate Analyst and Asset Manager

This is a crucial role that requires strong attention to detail and knowledge of DCAA policies and procedures. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in bookkeeping and accounting, with a focus on government contracts. Responsibilities: - Manage all aspects of bookkeeping and accounting processes - Prepare financial statements and reports - Ensure compliance with DCAA regulations - Monitor and reconcile accounts payable and receivable - Perform financial analysis and provide recommendations Requirements: - Proven experience as a Bookkeeper/Accountant with DCAA knowledge - Strong understanding of DCAA regulations and compliance - Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero) - Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills - Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities Size: Medium Duration: 3 to 6 months Expertise: Intermediate

description: PLEASE NOTE: APPLICATIONS WITHOUT A RESUME WILL BE REJECTED. we’re looking for a General Virtual Assistant to start immediately! We are seeking a skilled and tech-savvy Contract Virtual Assistant to join our dynamic team. As a Contract Virtual Assistant, you will play a key role in supporting our operations and contributing to our growth. Your excellent computer skills, troubleshooting abilities, sense of urgency, and eagerness to advance within the company will be vital to your success in this role. Responsibilities: Accurately request and process medical records, prioritizing attention to detail to ensure precision. Independently troubleshoot and resolve technical issues to maintain seamless operations. Manage email communications with professionalism, responding efficiently and effectively. Maintain accurate and well-organized records and documentation for easy accessibility. Collaborate with team members to optimize workflows and contribute to overall company success. Demonstrate a proactive approach to task completion, consistently meeting deadlines. Exhibit a commitment to personal and professional growth, showing enthusiasm for learning. Proficiently use a range of software tools, including Adobe Acrobat, Dropbox, Microsoft Office, and Google Workspace. Apply experience with CRM software to enhance client and case management. Showcase exceptional attention to detail in all tasks. Qualifications: Advanced computer skills with proficiency in a variety of software applications. Technologically adept with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues effectively. Highly organized with exceptional attention to detail. Proactive and adaptable, excelling in dynamic and fast-paced environments. Proven ability to work independently while maintaining efficiency and productivity. Strong sense of urgency and dedication to delivering exceptional results. Eager to learn, grow, and actively contribute to the success of the company. Location: This is a remote position, allowing you to work from your preferred location.

description: PLEASE NOTE: APPLICATIONS WITHOUT A RESUME WILL BE REJECTED. We are seeking a diligent and organized Data Entry Clerk to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for accurately inputting and managing data into our systems, ensuring that all information is up-to-date and easily accessible. Your attention to detail and ability to work efficiently will play a crucial role in maintaining the integrity of our operations. You will work closely with different departments to gather necessary information and will assist in preparing reports as needed. Responsibilities Enter and update data into company databases accurately and efficiently. Verify the accuracy of data before it is entered into our systems. Manage and maintain physical and digital files in an organized manner. Assist in generating reports and summaries based on entered data as required. Collaborate with team members to streamline data entry processes and improve workflows. Monitor and review data for errors and make corrections as necessary. Respond to internal inquiries regarding data entry and data management practices. Requirements High school diploma or equivalent; additional education in data management or related field is a plus. Proven experience as a data entry clerk or in a similar position. Strong attention to detail and high levels of accuracy when entering information. Familiarity with data entry software and Microsoft Office Suite, particularly Excel. Excellent time management skills and ability to prioritize tasks effectively. Strong communication skills to liaise with team members and other departments. Ability to handle confidential information with integrity and discretion. Benefits Competitive salary with opportunities for growth Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance Flexible work hours with remote work options Generous paid time off including holidays and vacation days Ongoing training and professional development opportunities
title: Data Entry Clerk - Remote

description: About Us: Brenton Way is a dynamic and innovative agency dedicated to delivering exceptional results for our clients. We pride ourselves on our collaborative culture and commitment to excellence. We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Operations Manager to join our team and drive operational efficiency and effectiveness. Role Overview: As the Operations Manager, you will work closely with agency leadership to design and execute operational strategies that align with our business goals. You will oversee critical functions, including change management, process implementation, team management, performance metrics, vendor relationships, and deliverables, to ensure seamless operations and client satisfaction. Key Responsibilities: Operational Strategy: Collaborate with Client leadership to define and execute operational strategies aligned with Client’s business objectives. Identify and recommend process improvements to streamline workflows and optimize resource allocation. Change Management: Facilitate organizational change initiatives, including technology adoption, process reengineering, and cultural shifts. Support lead-generation initiatives as directed by Client. Process Implementation: Develop and implement standardized processes for project management, client onboarding, and internal operations. Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices. Team Management: Coordinate with Client teams to ensure effective communication, resource allocation, and timely project delivery. Provide guidance to enhance team productivity and professional growth. Performance Metrics: Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) for operational efficiency, client satisfaction, and financial performance. Deliver monthly reports evaluating KPIs and progress. Vendor Management: Evaluate vendor relationships, negotiate contracts, and monitor service quality as needed. Provide recommendations for optimizing vendor selection and cost-effectiveness. Strategic Partnerships: Build and nurture strategic partnerships with vendors and other agencies to expand Client’s operational and business opportunities. Identify mutually beneficial collaboration opportunities and establish formal partnership agreements. Sales Support: Enhance Client’s sales efforts by improving sales materials and supporting the preparation of upcoming pitches. Collaborate with the sales team to create compelling presentations and documentation tailored to prospective clients. Deliverables: Monthly Reports summarizing activities, achievements, and recommendations. Process Documentation for key workflows and procedures. Operational Recommendations to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. Sales materials and pitch decks as required. Qualifications: Proven experience in operations management, preferably in an agency or similar fast-paced environment. Strong leadership and team management skills. Expertise in process design, implementation, and optimization. Familiarity with performance metrics and reporting. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities effectively. Proficiency in [mention relevant tools, e.g., project management software, CRM systems]. Willingness to work in the office a few times a month.
title: Operations Manager for a Leading Digital Marketing Agency in Los Angeles, California

description: Dental Lab is seeking a proactive and professional appointment setter to join our team on a part-time basis. Your primary role will be to contact dental offices based on hot leads who have expressed interest through our social media ads. Your task will be to identify the right contact at the office, explain our services briefly, and set up a follow-up phone or Zoom call between them and our team. Responsibilities: Contact dental offices using provided hot leads. Schedule appointments for phone or Zoom calls with the appropriate contact in the dental office. Provide a basic explanation of our dental lab services (training provided). Enter and manage lead information in our Zoho CRM system. Requirements: Proven experience in appointment setting or a similar role. We are located in IL, but we sell nationwide, in the U.S. Perfect, native English language with no accent is mandatory. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Basic understanding of CRM software, preferably Zoho CRM. Ability to commit to 2 hours per day. Sales skills are essential, though direct selling is not required. What We Offer: A supportive team environment. Training on our services and CRM system. The opportunity to contribute to a company that's making a significant impact in the dental industry. If you are organized, enthusiastic, and ready to help build connections that matter, we would love to hear from you!
title: Appointment setter is needed
